des: "This unusual drink has a savory quality, with the root veggie juice complementing the slightly spicy rye whiskey."
ins: Pour rye whiskey, carrot juice, simple syrup, and quinquina wine into a cocktail shaker; cover and shake twice to mix. Strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with tarragon.
